title: lionheart78
author: lionheart78
content: It has been some time since I stumbled upon a game that can give us satoshi as a reward.  They might not that much but at least we can earn some satoshi while we are having fun.  This list of games is created by THNDR, they are mobile game apps that reward us with satoshi while having fun.Here is the list of the game and its description:Club Bitcoin SolitaireQuoteIf you like Solitaire, then you will fall in love with Club Bitcoin. Play the most tantalizing Classic Solitaire game on the market while earning Bitcoin! What more could you want?Get it on:  Bitcoin BounceQuoteSee how far you can bounce along the Blockchain, trying not to fall! A challenging game that requires fast reflexes and timing.Get it on:  Turbo 84QuoteCan you reach 100 mph? How about 200 mph? Drive as fast as you canthrough this insane lane changing game. Just try not to crash on yourway to reaching your top speed!Get it on:  Bitcoin snakeQuoteThe Classic Snake game - now with Bitcoin! One of the most wellknown and most popular mobile games in the world now has a new twist!Get it on:  Bitcoin BayQuoteA bubble shooter game set in a beautiful tropical location! Have fun and chill by downloading this relaxing seaside bubble shooter today.Get it on:  These are only a few lists of the game where we can earn satoshi, actually, this is like a faucet but the host made claiming satoshi to be fun.  If you know any Bitcoin games or games that reward satoshi please feel free to share them.  Request:Please no "not worth the time" reply we all know the faucet reward is minuscule, the aim is to get the list of games where we can earn satoshi while having fun, and @mod if this thread doesn't belong to this board, kindly move it to where it should be thanks!Source: https://www.thndr.games/

It either that or the site ceases to exist...That is about why anyone will tell you that is not worthwhile.

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: It's a good move targeting mobile gaming since they are the biggest market right now. Maybe add "mobile" in the title since all the games mentioned are downloaded and played through your phone. It looks like some of them supports lightning network so players won't have scalability issues on claiming or withdrawing their rewards but the fee charged on withdrawal doesn't seem too friendly.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: How much can you make playing those games? Personally, I've had more success completing tasks on offerwalls (OfferToro) where you have to download mobile games and reach a determined goal inside the game. It may take a day or two to complete an offer, but they pay 8000-20000 satoshis sometimes. And now that the market is crashing rewards must increase even more, so it might worth to work on those tasks for now and save the rewards for the future, once bitcoin gains more traction again. It would be interesting to have a thread to talk and discuss about what offers of that kind are most interesting and hints/tricks about the demanded games, so others can complete the tasks faster.Congrats for your list, anyway!

comments.author: m2017
comments.body: If the choice is between wasting time playing games and getting nothing in return and earning some satoshi playing games, then the choice seems obvious to me. It is a pity that the creators of popular games don't add a similar feature, which would create a micro-revolution in bitcoin adoption. It's just incomprehensible how the user base would expand bitcoin because millions of people play the games. If thinking about bitcoin popularizing, then need to look in this direction. The games that OP briefly described in his post will attract their audience, but are unlikely to become mega-popular hits, and yet, there are still few games with a reward of satoshi. The fact that it appear, even if slowly, is still a movement for bitcoin, albeit a small one, but forward.
